data.name: Sclender Demo
data.detailed_description:
Sclender Lite Edition. This non-time limited demo features:
  • output rendering up to 1080p and 30 fps
data.about_the_game:
Sclender Lite Edition. This non-time limited demo features:
  • output rendering up to 1080p and 30 fps
data.short_description: Sclender Lite Edition. This non-time limited demo features:output rendering up to 1080p and 30 fps

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Haswell or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
